title: The Real Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy Movie
featuredTitle: The Real Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy Movie
description: The real Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy must protect Fort Lox and its five billion Krabby Patties from the devious Kelp-Thing!
quote: Prepare to feel my wrath, you foul villain!
starring: Mermaid Man, Barnacle Boy, Sandy Cheeks
altHero: elderly Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy
alt1: a homemade Kelp-Thing hangs from wires in a vault full of Krabby Patties
alt2: Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy stand at the entrance of the vault
alt4: a gloved fist pound with starbursts
